title: ARAM BOTS
body: Can You Please Stop Puttin Bots In ARAM Games I'm Tired Of Joining A Game And Findin Out The Team Full Of Suicidal Bots It's Not Fun For Anyone & I Know I'm Not The Only One Who Feels This Way

replies.body:
Lol, what? There are no bots in aram. 

..Just really shitty players that trash-talk and die repeatedly.

Also why are you capitalizing the first letter of every word?
there actually is  A LOOOOT of bots in ARAM. its irritating as fuck

Just had another game totally ruined by bots. Kat and Kalista bot teammates would stay back by minions and then after everyone on our team dies they go in to solo turret and 1v5 every time. Enemy had varus and jhinn easily picked us off, free win for them. The enemy had a Gragas bot but at least he acted as a meat shield, while our Kat and Kalista were mostly useless staying behind minions not poking at all, ended with something like 2K damage dealt.

Yea, I really hate getting bots in ARAM. They literally just run down the lane and attack the first thing they come across. 

feelsbadman

Yeah checkout the post I just made last night about it

http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/player-behavior-moderation/Evx9PQsi-more-bots-in-aram

I've noticed an extreme number of Jhinn and Soraka bots, If you see Jhinn shoot skillshot straight into the wall when no enemies are around, then you can usually assume it's a bot, I've seen it do this same glitch many times, same with his R he will start it but not cast any missiles just stand there. Then the Soraka and Sona bots that aren't healing at all the entire game.
